value.name: Advocates say Rockford-area agencies should release unedited videos of police shootings
value.description: Faustin Guetigo, inside their home. The shootings occurred during a time of heightened and nationwide awareness and scrutiny of the use of force by police against people of color.

value.name: Letter: Opinion on police misleading, offensive
value.description: George Floyd’s inexcusable death was mixed with Ma’khia Bryant’s and Faustin Guetigo’s deaths. Why didn’t he include Ashli Babbit who was killed by police Jan. 6? Because she was white?

value.name: Full List of 229 Black People Killed by Police Since George Floyd's Murder
value.description: U.S. George Floyd Police Killings Police brutality Black Lives Matter At least 229 Black people have been killed by police officers across the U.S. in the year since George Floyd's murder. Today ...
